skein shown below colourway charcoal this stylish crocheted take on the ubiquitous slouchy hooks & notions beanie is limitlessly customizable it will look fantastic 4 0mm / size g-6 crochet hook or size required to get gauge in fun hand-dyed yarn or sophisticated in semi-solids locking stitch marker plus since the hat is worked from the top down you can tapestry needle effortlessly create a fit that suits your style smaller or larger with just a little or lots of slouch tips the hat begins at the top of the crown and is worked in a continuous spiral downward increases shape the crown until the desired size is reached then the hat is worked straight still in a spiral for the body and the brim creating a custom size is easy just work until the crown is as big around as you want then begin working straight the amount of slouch can also be customized this pattern is written using north american terminology this is a draft copy please send any feedback to info rivercityyarns com @
